content:
From: Jeremy Avigad <avigad@cmu.edu>
Friends,

The following paper has now appeared online at the Journal of Automated
Reasoning:

A Formally Verified Proof of the Central Limit Theorem
Jeremy Avigad, Johannes HÃ¶lzl, Luke Serafin

article: https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10817-017-9404-x
preprint: http://arxiv.org/abs/1405.7012

It describes a formalization of the CLT in Isabelle, as well as the
supporting libraries.

Best wishes,

Jeremy
